data.message: Happiness has nothing to do with marriage.  Changing what marriage was defined to be is wrong.

replies.message: hi :) if you don't mind, please send me a friend request..
God. marriage is defined by a man and a woman coming together before God. or so it was and should be.
Happiness has nothing to do with marriage? Defined to be? Marriage is a privilidge
God does not exist. So what then?
Science proves that we are derived from the same particles of which are located above our heads; the Universe.
What can you fugs not understand.  ITS YOUR GOD NOT EVERYONE's!  I REPEAT   YOUR"S!
You'll know the truth when you bow before our Lord at the time of your judgement. Ignorance will not be bliss.

you guys just love using that book of yours as an excuse to hate..in your world it is a sin to kill the unborn but you don't seem to have a problem killing adults if you don't like their beliefs, you use your god to excuse your own evil, surely that's a sin...and sorry but grow up, dead is dead, now is the time to get things right, you only get one chance and if you really believed your book you would give away all your possessions to the poor and go out and do good instead of listening to the same old crap every sunday..try looking at the world and thinking about what your jesus said :)

Andor... You are confused or ignorant. A true Christian doesn't hate anyone nor do we believe its ok to kill, in a form of murder. Self defense isn't murder. Having possessions isn't necessarily wrong; the things people do to have possessions could be wrong, as well as allowing those things to shape who we are. I hate nobody. I care enough to be concerned about where others souls spend eternity. Honestly, I think I care more about others' souls, then some of the people do themselves. Please, don't let false Christians cause you to hate true Christians.
defined by God and anyone with morals.. DUH

Marriage has been in countries long before god came to them. The Greeks got married and they believed in many gods, the Chinese got married and they didn't believe in god, the Indians (Both America and from India). Marriage is about two people joining together. In some countries people got married because of love in others because their parents said they had to.
